name: LoveMoneyTiran
description:
A game about bad gamedeveloper, who doesnt want to release the game and fed up by gullible gamelovers... It is a parody about his working days.

Game has  a lot of bugs and doesnt fininsh yet, Our excuses about that...

P.S. In platfomer part you have a timer, through gameplay we havent enough time to describe: it is time to release a game and you should kill you teammates to slow down the release. Again sorry, I dont add dialog system to platformer(code for that part was already done.  It is the most terrible thing as for me...)

P.P.S. Where a similar contral for platformer part: shift/left mouse button to attack; space/Up arrow to jump; you can walk as for WASD, as for arrows.
